<NEW>

There is a sad look on LORD ELDER's fac=
e as he watched WINDLORD and
QUICKSTRIDE talk. There was a part of him that=
 well understood the
anger. Most of the Maximals had lost something, but WI=
NDLORD had lost
more than most.

"Anger." said a voice from the doorway as =
the two talked. However it
was not LORD ELDER that spoke but RODIMUS PRIME =
as he stepped foward,
he had left the meeting to check on WINDLORD. He had =
a feeling he knew
what was going on.

"Hydras took something from us." RODI=
MUS said, his voice gaining a
gruff edge to it, his own emotions reaching t=
he surface but then beat
back by his own will. "He took our dignity or will=
s away from us, our
sense of control. All of us are going to feel that from=
 time to time,
especially us!" he said. "It's not the feeling of the anger =
that is
dangerous, but what you do with it?"

A warmth and softness crept i=
nto RODIMUS' voice. "Will you control it
and use it to give you purpose and=
 endurance or will you let it
consume you and turn you back into what Hydra=
s tried to make you?"

LORD ELDER just stood, his optics brightening as he =
watched the growth
that come to RODIMUS, something that warmed his energon =
pump. Perhaps
this will rub off on TUSCON as well.

(TAG)

Preston
